info.name: GeoGuessr Larger Map Editor
info.description:
EDIT: Since another update they enlarged the map editor so this style is now pretty much useless.

Enlarges the map editor and put the preview in a corner to keep the map scale always visible.
Note: This style suits best for 1080p screens and may no be adapted for smaller screens.
info.additionalInfo: v1.0 - Initial release, adapted for the 2020/02/15 GeoGuessr update
